Html:
The default ModernWindow style does not include a ContentPresenter. Content is rendered by user controls that are navigable by adding links to the MenuLinksGroups. What you need is a blank window that does include a ContentPresenter, and ignores the MenuLinkGrups. This style is available as the BlankWindow style. This works;
<mui:ModernWindow Style="{StaticResource BlankWindow}">
  ..
</mui:ModernWindow>
